keyword: how many calories in a cup brown rice
title: How Many Calories in a Cup of Brown Rice?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cup brown rice (cooked), including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for easy meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Cup of Brown Rice?
assumptions: Cooked long-grain brown rice, 1 US cup (195g serving), boiled in water without added salt, oil, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice variety, cooking method, water absorption, and additions like oil or salt. Check packaging for specific brands.

quick_answer.text: One cup of cooked brown rice provides about 218 kcal, 45.8 g carbs, and 3.5 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil during cooking
Uncooked (dry) brown rice per cup measure
Mix in 1/4 cup cooked vegetables (e.g., peas)

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of cooked brown rice?
faqs.a: Approximately 218 kcal for 1 cup (195g) cooked brown rice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cup brown rice?
faqs.a: About 4.5 g protein per cup of cooked brown rice.

faqs.q: Does brown rice have more fiber than white?
faqs.a: Yes, 3.5 g fiber per cup versus about 0.6 g in white rice.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a cup brown rice?
faqs.a: Roughly 45.8 g total carbs, including 3.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are these values for cooked or dry brown rice?
faqs.a: Cooked; dry brown rice per cup is about 680 kcal due to water loss in cooking.
